name: Dash Widget
author: Orangefix

sections.description:
A lightweight WordPress plugin to showcase all your social media feeds.

Try out these new features with our latest release

  • NEW: Facebook Integration. You can now add your Facebook account and access all your Facebook Pages through Widget Builder. Add as many accounts as you want.
  • NEW: Facebook Page. You can now choose any of your Facebook Pages under your selected Facebook Account.
  • NEW: Facebook Feed Widget. You can now embed your Facebook Page Feed.
  • NEW: Facebook Album Widget. You can now embed your Facebook Album Feed. Choose Facebook Album as page item.
  • NEW: Carousel for Instagram widgets. Click any of the tiles, and you can now access each individual Instagram Post in Carousel view.
  • Improved user interface of Widget Builder

Embed your Instagram feed with few simple steps:

  1. Create a widget
  2. Connect your Instagram account
  3. Check how your widget looks on the preview section, and customize to your liking
  4. Copy the widget shortcode and paste it on your WordPress page

How to Embed your Facebook Album:

  1. Create a widget
  2. Connect your Facebook account
  3. Select a Facebook page
  4. Select Page Album as page item
  5. Select an album
  6. Check how your widget looks on the preview section, and customize to your liking
  7. Make sure to Save Changes
  8. Copy the widget shortcode and paste it on your WordPress page

How to Embed your Facebook Feed:

  1. Create a widget
  2. Connect your Facebook account
  3. Select a Facebook page
  4. Select Page Feed as page item
  5. Use the widget shortcode on your WordPress page
  6. Check how your widget looks on the preview section, and customize to your liking
  7. Make sure to Save Changes
  8. Copy the widget shortcode and paste it on your WordPress page
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Plugin built-in version checker fixes

1.0.1

  • NEW: Facebook Integration. You can now add your Facebook account and access all your Facebook Pages through Widget Builder. Add as many accounts as you want.
  • NEW: Facebook Page. You can now choose any of your Facebook Pages under your selected Facebook Account.
  • NEW: Facebook Feed Widget. You can now embed your Facebook Page Feed.
  • NEW: Facebook Album Widget. You can now embed your Facebook Album Feed. Choose Facebook Album as page item.
  • NEW: Carousel for Instagram widgets. Click any of the tiles, and you can now access each individual Instagram Post in Carousel view.
  • Improved user interface of Widget Builder

1.0.0

  • Debut plugin tailored for Instagram. Support for Facebook and Twitter soon.
